###Random stuff
This site houses a collection of programs created by me, Arjo Chakravarty. The pages serve as a start place for people to see the documentation and download the source code. My current projects include a speech recognition library for the arduino.
* [ÂµSpeech Speech recognition framework](http://arjo129.github.com/uSpeech/)
name: Arjo129.github.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
